steps.label: Receive Email Request
steps.detail: The system receives an email request at the endpoint /item/{email_id}/ai-edit.
steps.scenario: A user sends a request to edit an email.

steps.label: Validate Email ID
steps.detail: The system validates the provided email ID to ensure it exists in the database.
steps.scenario: The email ID is valid and exists in the database.

steps.label: Fetch Email Data
steps.detail: The system retrieves the email data associated with the validated email ID from the database.
steps.scenario: The email data is successfully fetched.

steps.label: Process AI Editing
steps.detail: The system processes the email data using AI algorithms to generate edits.

steps.label: Generate Edited Email
steps.detail: The system generates the edited version of the email based on AI processing results.
steps.scenario: The edited email is successfully generated.

steps.label: Return Edited Email
steps.detail: The system sends the edited email back to the user as a response.
steps.scenario: The edited email is returned successfully.

edge_cases.label: Invalid Email ID
edge_cases.detail: The system receives a request with an invalid email ID.
edge_cases.scenario: The system responds with an error indicating the email ID is not found.

edge_cases.label: AI Processing Error
edge_cases.detail: An error occurs during the AI processing of the email data.
edge_cases.scenario: The system responds with an error indicating the processing failed.

edge_cases.label: Database Connection Failure
edge_cases.detail: The system fails to connect to the database while fetching email data.
edge_cases.scenario: The system responds with an error indicating a database connection issue.
